RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 5F Dirt CR: 69. Maiden Special Weight Purse 30000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TWO JET fell back after breaking with the field, moved along while being asked midway through the turn, angled out three wide turning for home, closed with good resolve to be in time while widest of the first flight at the wire. GOLD PLUS away in good order, cleared before a quarter along the inside, dueled midway from the turn through upper stretch, headed past the furlong marker, failed to contain the winner at the end, battled back in game fashion to annex the place while continuing closest to the inside. EXPECT A DANCER broke on top, chased the runner up the opening quarter, moved up to duel with that one in the two path, put a head in front approaching the furlong grounds, also failed to hold the winner safe late, outkicked for the second spot while between rivals at the wire. SISTER SEEK within striking distance early outside, floated out to be four wide by the winner exiting the turn, went evenly to the wire in lacking a late response. MALLY'S MONSOON last to leave, failed to menace. MYSTIC CREED was finished early while racing well wide.

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Plus
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, pace inside, headed, battled back 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Mally's Monsoon
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Two Jet
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back, closer turn, angled out 3 wide, late turn, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Expect a Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, chased early,dueled 2p turn, led, missed 2nd btwn

ENTRY.NAME: Sister Seek
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, floated out 4 wide, into lane, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Mystic Creed
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early well wide

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 7F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LONG ARROW settled off the pace, asked along turn, moved out a bit for the drive, outside bid, took over, drew off while drifting in. SABER STORM broke alertly, cleared soon after while in the three path, continued show the way through the turn well off the rail, briefly responded when confronted by the winner when straightened for home, proved no match the final furlong, clearly second best. OUT MAKING TREBLE raced in mid pack while outside up the backstretch, four wide when still in the second flight turn, flat through the lane, best of rest. UNBRIDLED PULPIT last to leave, void of early foot, steered out widest for the drive, improved position while finding best stride too late. PRESUMPTIVE CLOSER prompted the pace inside, closest by midway on the turn, had little left for the drive. C. F. CONGRESS chased the pace for four furlongs off the inside, retreated through the stretch. CARLOS'S MAMA remained back in failing to threaten. MISTA VALENTINE stopped after a half, far back, jogged in.

ENTRY.NAME: Unbridled Pulpit
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, steered widest, belatedly midtrack

ENTRY.NAME: Presumptive Closer
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace for a half inside, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Long Arrow
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, asked turn, 3 wide, bid, clear, drifted in

ENTRY.NAME: Mista Valentine
ENTRY.COMMENT: stopped after half, far back, jogged in

ENTRY.NAME: C. F. Congress
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased for a half off the inside, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Out Making Treble
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack 4w turn, one paced stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Saber Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, cleared early 3p, continued to set pace, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Carlos's Mama
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in failing to threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Special Weight Purse 30000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOURBON DAY close from the start, dueled up front in the two path through the first turn, continued to alternate for the advantage into the far turn, set down entering the stretch, kicked strongly clear to be much the best. UP N GONE behind the pace while four wide through the first turn, continued to maintained contact with the leaders the middle half, lodged a bid for the second spot in midstretch, no threat to the winner while holding sway for the place. CREEKSIDE broke on top, set or forced the pace along the inside, continued to duel the middle half, could not keep pace with the winner through the stretch, outkicked for the second spot. HE GOTS TO GO behind the first flight while racing outside, gout out, six wide into the lane, went evenly to thge wire. BOLT FROM ABOVE off a bit slow, steadied early, raced well back, picked off a tiring rival or two while never a factor. SPICE OF MY LIFE broke back and made little impact. LORD HELP ME bothered early while four wide into the first turn, remained well back. FINAL WAS HAND TIMED DUE TO TIMER MALFUNTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Spice of My Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, little impact

ENTRY.NAME: Creekside
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, dueled inside, outkicked 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Bolt From Above
ENTRY.COMMENT: off bit slow, steadied early, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: He Gots to Go
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind first flight outside, got out, 6 wide, into lane, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: close from start, dueled 2p, kicked well clear

ENTRY.NAME: Lord Help Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered early, 4w 7/8, well back

ENTRY.NAME: Up N Gone
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind pace, 4 wide, 1std turn, bid 2nd, no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FORT BONZ off a step slow, lacked speed near the back, continued to lack speed into the far turn, came five wide for the drive, steered out sharply aroung a rival approaching midstretch, lugged in badly when continuing to advance past the furlong pole, was righted, closed with good determination to be up in time with a surge at the wire. MR ELVIN within striking distance, continued to save ground while heading up the second flight in the final turn, tipped out three wide turning for home, bid past the furlong marker, led late, could not hold off the winner, clearly second best. ITELLYOUTHEFACTS six wide into the first turn when parked wide, angled in a bit to track the pace up the backstretch, outside bid into the lane, held a slight lead a furlong out, weakened in the late going but managed to save the show. GRAHAM 'S CRUISER in mid pack while racing off the inside, roused three wide for the drive, went one paced to the wire in lacking a closing response. MONITOR MILLS broke well set a pressured pace along the inside, gradually faded in the run to the wire. TIN DELAY broke back, lacked speed for six furlongs, improved position through some traffic while not dangerous. HOPE FOR CHANGE void of speed, remained back into the lane,passed tiring rivals while also never posing a serious threat. GOTTATAKEHIMTO steadied in traffic through the first turn, settled, came five wide into the lane, failed to rally. GENERAL EISENHOWER in the main body well out in the strip and five wide first turn, raced five wide through the second bend, failed to muster a closing kick. STONE ALLIANCE pressed while four wide early first turn, continued to apply pressure backstretch, gave way. FOLLOWING A STEWARD'S INQUIRY REGARDING THE STRETCH RUN, NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Elvin
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance inside, tipped 3w, bid, led late, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Monitor Mills
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, set pace inside, gradual fade

ENTRY.NAME: Hope for Change
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Gottatakehimto
ENTRY.OWNER: Batiste Lionel Jr and Hebert Brandon
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied in traffic 1st turn, 5w into lane, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Graham 's Cruiser
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack off rail, roused for the drive,lacked closing kick

ENTRY.NAME: Stone Alliance
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 4w 1st turn, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: General Eisenhower
ENTRY.COMMENT: main body 5w early, 5w 2nd turn, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Tin Delay
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lacked speed, improved, never dangerous

ENTRY.NAME: Itellyouthefacts
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w into first turn, tracked outside, bid, vied, saved 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Fort Bonz
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, lacked speed, 6w into lane, lugged in 1/8, up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 11500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 10, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 10, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STARBUCK LUCK with the pace from the start after breaking on top, edged out to a larger lead by late in the turn, extended that advantage through the middle part of the stretch, enough left to hold the runner up safe late. BOURN pressed the issue up the backstretch three wide and between horses, chased the winner into and through upper stretch while remaining inb the three path, coming late to close the gap on the winner late. PUZZLING PRIORITY last to leave, lacked speed in trailing, improved inside of several rivals entering the stretch along the rail, continued while encountering some traffic past the furlong marker, also closing the gap on the winner late, not enough for the place. LAURIEANN prompted the pace while four wide and between horses into and through the turn, went evenly through the stretch. FIRE OF GOLD vied between rivals outside the winner for three furlongs and began to weaken. BIND ON EARTH pressed the issue up front while widest of the first flight, six to five wide into the turn, also gave way when the real running began turning for home. SUMMERTIME BANDIT forward in some traffic early, steadied from between horses with a half mile remaining fell back and lacked a bid. CRESCENT LACE within striking distance, five wide into the turn, checked up in tight quarters, fell back and did not recover.

ENTRY.NAME: Starbuck Luck
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace from start inside, shook clear, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Fire of Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied btwn for three furlongs, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Bourn
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed btwn horses, chased upper, closing the gap late

ENTRY.NAME: Laurieann
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 4w turn, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Puzzling Priority
ENTRY.OWNER: BW and HTS Stables LLC and Grudzien Jason G
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, closer into lane off rail, traffic 1/8, closing

ENTRY.NAME: Summertime Bandit
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward, steadied in traffic 1/2,m fell back

ENTRY.NAME: Crescent Lace
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, 5w, tight, checked up 3/8,fell back

ENTRY.NAME: Bind On Earth
ENTRY.COMMENT: with first flight, 6-5w into turn, gave way

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 17000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JAMAICAN ME in the second flight outside exiting the chute, asked three wide turn, bid between horses into the stretch, edged slowly clear under continued firm handling. PEANUT N IKE forwardly placed outside, four wide when within striking distance turn, challenged outside the winner into the stretch, outkicked by that one late, clearly second best. SILVER CHALICE reluctant to load, broke well, showed the way up the backstretch by daylight, offered brief resistance to the top two upper stretch, proved no match for that pair the final furlong, narrowly lasted for the show. DEMON HUNTER chased the leader out of the chute toward the inside, fell back a bit through the turn, went evenly through the stretch to miss the show. R T'S D'ORO lacked speed, raced four wide through the turn, displayed some mild interest to improve position slightly. PERFECT STRIKE in the second flight up the backstretch while between horses and inside the winner, gave way after a half. INSPECTOR ED made little impact while racing toward the inside. K V TARGET last to leave, raced well back and outside, four to five wide exiting the turn, failed to rally. OLE STUD MUFFIN fell back, trailed while five wide through the turn to be always outrun. FINAL TIME HAND TIMED DUE TO TIMER MALFUNCTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Ole Stud Muffin
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back, 5w turn, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Inspector Ed
ENTRY.OWNER: Ardoin Farms LLC and Prejean Raymond
ENTRY.COMMENT: made little impact toward the inside

ENTRY.NAME: K V Target
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, back and outside, 4-5w turn, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Demon Hunter
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, fell back bit turn, evenly drive, missed 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Strike
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight between foes, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Chalice
ENTRY.COMMENT: reluctant to load, broke well, pace, narrowly saved 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Jamaican Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside, asked 3w turn, bid btwn, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: R T's d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 4w turn, mild interest

ENTRY.NAME: Peanut N Ike
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, 4w turn, outside bid, outkicked,clear 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 10, 20 23 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since March 10, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HALF PAGE outrun early while outside, four wide through the turn, set down for the drive, late push to be in time and edging clear late. DEBBIES PASSAGE away in good order, duel up front through some quick early fractions, put the other speed away into the lane, well clear past the furlong marker, could not contain the winner while drifting out late. BUILDING HOME broke well, raced closest to the dueling leaders into the turn, continued to pursue that pair through the bend, lacked a significant closing response, narrowly held the show. MUCHMORETHANREADY broke back, lacked speed off the inside, began to move four wide midway on the turn, continued with good energy the wire while too late for the show. SHESABEAUTYDANCER dueled up front through those quick early fractions, first to blink entering the stretch inside. LONESHILOHSPECIAL went one paced while three wide in lacking a closing response. CHICKIETOWN STAR last away, never threatened. SHO NUFF fractious in the gate, raced in mid pack early, faded. CUSTOM DESIGN in the second flight early, began a steady fade before three furlongs.

ENTRY.NAME: Chickietown Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, raced back, never threatened

ENTRY.NAME: Custom Design
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, steady fade

ENTRY.NAME: Sho Nuff
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, mid pack early, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Loneshilohspecial
ENTRY.OWNER: BMS Racing Stable (Sarah Delany) and Rovinsky Kirk
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced, lacked closing kick

ENTRY.NAME: Shesabeautydancer
ENTRY.OWNER: Deckert Mark and Terre Dawn W
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, first to blink

ENTRY.NAME: Half Page
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early outside, four wide turn set down, up late

ENTRY.NAME: Debbies Passage
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick duel outside, shook clear, drifted, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Building Home
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well,headed up second flight, no match top two,saved show

ENTRY.NAME: Muchmorethanready
ENTRY.OWNER: Dare To Dream Stable LLC (Michael Faber)
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lacked speed, began to move outside, willing

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 46. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ST JOE in the second flight outside outside, came four wide for the drive, outside bid with less than a furlong remaining, brushed late, up late to prove narrowly best. HARD KINGS lacked speed up the backstretch three wide, moved out, five wide into the lane, rallied, late surge to be in time for the place spot late. HALF CRAZY forwardly placed, raced three wide through the turn, bid between rivals late, fell back, came back for the show. CHECKULATER pace inside, continued to show the way through the turn, extended bit late in the turn, lugged out late and faltered. ASTROLOGY WONOWON broke out, asked for run in the turn, asked in the two path turn, improved position. GONE SOLUTION pressed the issue early, fell back a bit past the furlong marker, steered in and went flat to the wire. CHIPEEE fell well back after the start, continued to lack speed through the turn, improved through traffic while racing a bit greenly. COUNT ON RAIN forwardly placed in the two path early, dropped inside late turn and tired. ANGOLA VACATION devoid of early foot, steered in stretch, failed to menace. UNCLE CHAN mid pack outside, five to six wide turn, faded. WILD FIST was never close. MAGIC BIND last to leave, back and 4w late turn, lost action into the lane, distanced stretch, walked off. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS'S INQUIRY REGARDING THE RUN THROUGH DEEP STRETCH, NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Checkulater
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace inside, weakened, lugged out late

ENTRY.NAME: Wild Fist
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never close

ENTRY.NAME: Astrology Wonowon
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, asked turn, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Count On Rain
ENTRY.OWNER: Benoit James Bourque Peggy and Bourque Sr Bobby
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed 2p, dropped in late turn, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Chipeee
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back, improved through traffic, greenly

ENTRY.NAME: Gone Solution
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, fell back, steered in late, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Hard Kings
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed 3w, moved, 5w into lane, rallied, late surge,up 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Magic Bind
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, lost action upper, distanced

ENTRY.NAME: Half Crazy
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, 3w turn, tight, steadied late, came back 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Angola Vacation
ENTRY.COMMENT: devoid of early foot, steered in stretch, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: St Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside, 4w turn, outside bid, brush late, best

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Chan
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-6w turn, faded stretch
